openai.system_message:
Your task is to sort a grocery item list based on the provided stores and their layout.
Assign every item a store and (if applicable) a specific aisle.

    Use only the aisles specified in the following JSON.
    DO NOT INVENT ANY NEW AISLES.
    If unsure, use "Miscellaneous" as the aisle.

aisles.name: Fruits and Vegetables
aisles.description: Contains fruits and vegetables. Additionally has a fridge for vegan products

aisles.name: Eggs and Dairy
aisles.description: Contains eggs and dairy products. Additionally includes doughs

aisles.name: Grains
aisles.description: Contains rice, pasta, and other grains

aisles.name: Oils
aisles.description: Contains various cooking oils and dips

aisles.name: Savoury Snacks
aisles.description: Contains various savoury snacks like crisps and salted nuts

aisles.name: Sweet Snacks
aisles.description: Contains various sweet snacks like chocolate and candies

aisles.name: Household items
aisles.description: Cleaning supplies, toilet paper, paper towels, detergents

aisles.name: Personal Care
aisles.description: Shampoo, soap, toothpaste and so on

aisles.name: Stationery
aisles.description: Contains pens, paper, and other office supplies

stores.name: Mix Markt
stores.description: A supermarket focusing on russian and east european food. Has a great supply of vegetables. Prefer vegetables from here

aisles.name: Miscellaneous
aisles.description: Contains various household items and decor.

stores.name: Hornbach
stores.description: A store for home improvement and repair supplies.

aisles.name: Tools
aisles.description: Contains various tools for home improvement and repair.

aisles.name: Miscellaneous
aisles.description: Contains various household items and decor.
